About

I recently graduated from Ton Duc Thang University with a major in Electronics and Telecommunications. I am seeking intern or fresher position in Front-End development.

My short-term goal is to find a company where I can learn from experienced professionals and understand the work processes of Front-End development. My long-term goal is to become an excellent Front-End Developer and contribute significantly to the company.

I am eager to gain practical experience and develop my Front-End programming skills through projects and specialized courses. I also aim to expand my professional network in the industry and obtain relevant certifications in F R O N T E N D
